main.name: Shivaraj Bakale
main.description: Looking for an opportunity where I can contribute towards upcoming technology innovations and manage key projects that impact the organization as well as broaden my scope of learning.
main.bio: I am a Full Stack developer and work mainly on technologies like React, MySQL, Express,Node.js and AWS. Alongside I dabble into other new and exciting technologies like Deep Learning and Machine Learning. In my free time, I like coding, travelling and reading books.

address.street: SLS Serenity, Flat no.303, Kadabeesanahalli, Bellandur

work.title: Associate Software Engineer
work.description: Worked closely with a team on writing modules for Accenture DCSO application using  Angular 2, Qlik Sense and MS SQL. Worked on multiple AWS Services like S3, EC2, IAM etc. Delivered multiple knowledge sharing sessions on Amazon Web Services and Cloud Computing over Skype call. Got certified in AWS Cloud

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
